content.prompt: According to some scholars, which of the following were added to the moai on platform (ahu) figures at Rapa Nui to activate their protective function?

choices.label: White coral and obsidian eyes inserted into carved-out sockets
Incised scarification patterns with inlaid ivory placed on their backs
Fiber and cloth drapery attached to the neck and body
Sharp metal objects hammered into the torso

topic.text: 9.3: Theories and Interpretations of Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
